function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of IoT in industrial settings may lead to higher risk of disease transmission due to increased interaction with shared equipment and spaces.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission among factory workers and personnel.","Mitigation":"Implementation of IoT solutions for contactless operation and monitoring of equipment, as well as regular disinfection protocols for shared spaces.","Technologies":"Contactless IoT sensors, IoT-enabled disinfection systems.","People":"Factory workers, personnel, industrial staff.","Owner":"Industrial facility management, IoT solution providers."},{"Description":"Additive manufacturing to meet increased demand for medical supplies may lead to potential contamination and safety risks in the production process.","Impact":"Contamination of medical supplies and potential safety risks for end users.","Mitigation":"Strict adherence to sterilization protocols, regular quality control checks, and certification of additive manufacturing processes for medical applications.","Technologies":"Sterilization equipment, quality control systems, certification processes for medical additive manufacturing.","People":"End users of medical supplies, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Medical supply manufacturers, additive manufacturing facilities."},{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases may disrupt manufacturing operations due to absenteeism, reduced operational hours, and limited on-site staff.","Impact":"Decreased productivity, delays in manufacturing processes, and increased demand for remote monitoring solutions.","Mitigation":"Implementation of remote monitoring and predictive maintenance solutions to minimize downtime, as well as flexible work arrangements to accommodate limited on-site staff.","Technologies":"Remote monitoring systems, predictive maintenance software, flexible work arrangement tools.","People":"Factory workers, industrial staff, management.","Owner":"Industrial facility management, predictive maintenance service providers."}]}
